title: Bushfire brigade
creator_credit: Eric Thompson and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: Illustrates the danger of bushfires and describes how bodies such as the Volunteer Bushfire Brigade and the Forestry Firefighting gangs are organised to prevent and fight bushfires.
creator_credit_for_label: Eric Thompson and Australian National Film Board
